Articles.Content:
I've been planning this for a while now.

I'm going to play through the ENTIRE wiki campaign.

Feel free to submit any craft for later missions (Mission profiles will be posted in Spacecraft Exchange, only submit craft when I put a post in that forum)

I will post screenshots whenever I can.

Now, you guys shall vote for the name of the series in the poll above!

 

 

Also I don't think I posted this in the right forum. Sorry.

No mods for craft submissions either (except for utility mods like Transfer Window Planner, KER, KAC, etc.)
Moved to Mission Reports and voted for Road to the Stars, good luck with the series
I vote Endurance, but only because I was just reading a book on Shackleton.
I say endurance! What is the wiki campaign?
Cool. I voted Endurance because that name sounds awesome. Another cool name is Perseverance. @ThatKSPGuy

Ok I'm interested already. I've looked at the campaigns but have not been able to find the time they would need. So want to see how you do.

Will you compare expected vs actual time achieved, any kind of scoring?
